Item ID3470

Fine cloth is a material used in the making of splitbark armour that must be given to the Wizard Jalarast in the Wizards' Tower to create pieces of splitbark armour or used with bark to craft splitbark armour. Fine cloth can be obtained from any level of chest in the Shades of Mort'ton minigame, but the higher level chests have a better chance of acquiring it.

11 Fine cloth is needed to purchase or craft a full set of splitbark armour.

'''Fine cloth''' is a material used in the making of [[splitbark armour]] that must be given to the [[Wizard Jalarast]] in the [[Wizards' Tower]] to create pieces of splitbark armour or used with bark to craft splitbark armour. Fine cloth can be obtained from any level of chest in the [[Shades of Mort'ton (minigame)|Shades of Mort'ton minigame]], but the higher level chests have a better chance of acquiring it.

11 Fine cloth is needed to purchase or craft a full set of splitbark armour.
